product_name: CliniqueLash Power Mascara Long-Wearing Tubing Formula
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Lash Power Mascara Long-Wearing Formula lasts through rain, sweat, humidity, tears. Yet the formula removes easily with warm water.
details: DetailsBenefitsLash effect: adds length.Unique brush reaches and beautifully lengthens even the tiniest lashes.Sweat and humidity-resistant.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2534695How To UseStart at lash roots, wiggling mascara brush to lash tips. Repeat to build. For lower lashes, hold mascara wand vertically.Clinique's innovative thermal technology helps it stay put for 24 hours - and is easy to remove. Use fingertips to splash warm water (bath temperature is ideal) on lashes several times and press gently. Or, wet a cotton pad with warm water, press to eye, then wipe away.Not recommended for use with Lash Building Primer. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Acrylates Copolymer, Kaolin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba, PEG-15 Glyceryl Stearate, Silica, Butylene Glycol, Beeswax\Cera Alba\Cire D'Abeille, Alcohol, Hydrogenated Rapeseed Alcohol, Bentonite, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Sucrose Distearate, Stearic Acid, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Dimethicone, Simethicone, Vp/Va Copolymer, Nylon-66, Tocopherol, Aminomethyl Propanediol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Carmine (CI 75470), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Chromium Oxide Greens (CI 77288), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Chromium Hydroxide Green (CI 77289).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start at lash roots, wiggling mascara brush to lash tips. Repeat to build. For lower lashes, hold mascara wand vertically.Clinique's innovative thermal technology helps it stay put for 24 hours - and is easy to remove. Use fingertips to splash warm water (bath temperature is ideal) on lashes several times and press gently. Or, wet a cotton pad with warm water, press to eye, then wipe away.Not recommended for use with Lash Building Primer. Remove with Clinique Take the Day Off Makeup Remover for Lids, Lashes, & Lips.
ingredients: Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax\ Copernicia Cerifera Cera \Cire De Carnauba

reviews.headline: Best non-smear mascara
reviews.comments: This is the only mascara that doesn't bleed or smear from sweat. Easy to wash off, too.

reviews.headline: My favorite mascara
reviews.comments: This is my favorite mascara, I love that it comes off with warm water.

reviews.headline: Not Clinique's Finest
reviews.comments: Love Clinique - been using their products since i was 13yo. But sadly, their Lash Power Mascara is not powerful at all. It doesn't lengthen or thicken my lashes. And it flakes. Disappointing.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: Able to find the color I needed

reviews.headline: This one is a no.
reviews.comments: Perhaps this mascara would work on thick eyelashes, but not mine. Very thin, skimpy coverage, did not " extend" them. Plus the tube is tiny. After washing it off at night, I have found small random clumps of it under my eyes the next day. Definitely a no.

reviews.headline: Started great, but now it flakes & clumps lashes
reviews.comments: I was recommended this by an employee. I was in search of a tubing mascara that gave lashes a natural look. This mascara started out fine but over time my lashes have clumped together & started to flake when I use it. The formulas itself does not get clumpy in the tube. I wouldn't recommend this mascara.

reviews.headline: Gone back !
reviews.comments: I have recently  started going back to Clinique and this mascara does not disappoint

reviews.headline: NG
reviews.comments: Every time I put mascara brush into tube, a long almost hair like stand came out with it. Didn't like it on at all.

reviews.headline: not the best, not the worst
reviews.comments: it definitely doesnt smudge but it does flake during application and slightly throughout wear. not a lot of product stays on the brush during application so it seems like i had to dip it in pretty often to get more product. made my lashes look long and pretty but does nottt hold a curl.

reviews.headline: Love the Feel & how easy it is to lean Off at Bedtime!
reviews.comments: Need a mascara that comes off easily when washing your face for bedtime!  This is it!

reviews.headline: Better than some
reviews.comments: I have purchased thus item several times due to twining eyelashes and clumping. It works best when the mascara us newer, it may thicken with time, so a clean application gets more challenging.

reviews.headline: Flakes off in less than an hour
reviews.comments: It's less than 6 months old and flakes off in less than an hour. I wish I could return it.

reviews.headline: SOO GOOD
reviews.comments: I LOVE THIS MASCARA IT DEFINITELY WORKS MY LASHES STAY UP ALL DAY AND I GET COMPLIMINTED ABOUT MY LASHES AND IS EASY TO REMOVE I PUT WATER ON MY FINGERTIPS AND RUBB MY LASHES AND COMES OFF EASILY ITS JIST EXPENSIVE

reviews.headline: Not the mascara for me
reviews.comments: I really wanted something to make it look like I had lashes. Mine are sparse. This was recommended but is not providing the look I wanted.

reviews.headline: No more panda eyes
reviews.comments: I was so sick of working a long shift, and the looking in the mirror and seeing that my mascara migrated down to my cheeks. I needed a tubing mascara that was gentle on the eyes and didn't move. This mascara does not budge until you need to remove it, and unlike other tubing mascaras, I never see my lashes come off with the mascara at the end of the night.

reviews.headline: i would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Product goes on clean lashes easily, covers evenly and doesn't run in the rain or with exercise. No greasy make-up removers needed. Love it!

reviews.headline: stays on brilliantly and comes off brilliantly
reviews.comments: Perfection!! Why am I just finding out about this mascara now?! I will use this as my #1 mascara. Please do not stop making it.

reviews.headline: Excellent product
reviews.comments: Love this product! I'll certainly buy it again. It brought out even the tiniest of my lashes. Added bonus was the saleswomen. Took her time and explained the proper use of it to me. I am very happy!

reviews.headline: not a fan
reviews.comments:
I love the color but..it flakes off in pieces all over my face. 
even after a couple days of cleaning my face itas still there and coming off or flaking off.

reviews.headline: favorite daily mascara
reviews.comments: this is my absolute favorite mascara - it will not give you the look of falsies but it does absolutely give you a little extra lift and volume and it last all day without smudging or clumping

faceoff_positive.comments: First of all, tubing mascara is one of the greatest cosmetic inventions EVER. I cannot for the life of me understand why everyone doesn't use it. I have very oily skin and am very sweaty, so I always used waterproof mascara. But even that would smudge and smear by the end of a work day or night out. I never have that problem with tubing mascara. It's seriously like a miracle. The ONLY downside is that if you have straight lashes (which I do), you will have to curl them before AND after application. However, I have tried several tubing mascaras now, and Lash Power is by far the best at holding a curl! Even Clinique's High Impact Curling Mascara (also a tubing formula) doesn't hold the curl as well as this one does. They pulled Lash Power out of stores a few months ago to do a reformulation and I entered full on panic mode. I have been stalking their instagram and harassing them on Twitter to get a re-release date AND IT'S FINALLY BACK. Get this mascara. You won't regret it.
faceoff_positive.headline: IT'S FINALLY BACK

faceoff_negative.comments: I don't often write reviews and I do like some Clinique products so I felt compelled to write a review about this to spare  somebody else's time searching for a mascara and energy to go return it. This is probably the saddest formula I have ever used in a mascara. The brush is so delicate it basically does nothing to apply the mascara to the lashes. It coars them, however offers zero benefit. You may as well go get a lash tint and walk out of the house sans mascara.  That is all this does. Tint. The wand and brush are cheap and it has zero weight making it feel strange applying the product- usually the handle has some sort of weight. There is no traction on the brush when applying. No lift, no seperation... Nada.  Not a tubing mascara either as the girls in the store suggested it is. All around fail.
faceoff_negative.headline: Skip it!

rollup.name: Lash Power Mascara Long-Wearing Tubing Formula
